ca.mcgill.ecse211.navigation

Class FlagSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.navigation.FlagSearcher

  • public class FlagSearcher
extends java.lang.Object
    This class includes all flag searching tasks of the robot. The class allows the execution of the search algorithm. The FlagSearcher makes the robot search for its target block by going on the perimeter of the search zone. When a block is found, the robot moves towards it to identify it. If the target block is found or if too much time was spent, the robot ends its search.
    Author:
    Bijan Sadeghi, Esa Khan, Guillaume Richard
